thread.title: Incentive travel conference says it's time to awaken your senses
thread.title_full: Incentive travel conference says it's time to awaken your senses

author: eTN Editor
title: Incentive travel conference says it's time to awaken your senses
text:
Incentive travel conference says it's time to awaken your senses Adv: 
By Anil Mathur, eTN India Correspondent | Jul 17, 2015 Adv: 
INDIA (eTN) - The global conference of the Society for Incentive Travel Excellence (SITE) will be held in New Delhi, India, from October 23 to 25 at the Taj Palace under the theme, “Awaken your Senses.” 
The event will discuss issues such as technology trends, human resources, and return on investment, said the SITE India Chapter head, Anup Nair. 
The conference is of special significance for India and Asia, as Rajeev Kohli of Creative Travel will have the gavel handed over to him, as he becomes the SITE President for 2016. He will be the first Asian to receive the honor of this position. 
Rajeev is the son of the late Ram Kohli who held various national and international positions. 
A great program has been chalked out by the organizers, and Pananma, where the next SITE conference will be held, will also host a luncheon at the New Delhi conference center.
